stepAnswer: add new column headings in a column adjacent to the current headings, and Excel automatically adds the adjacent column to the table's range
stepTitle: How do you add new columns to the table?
choices: add new column headings in a column adjacent to the current headings, and Excel automatically adds the adjacent column to the table's range
change the column width, and Excel automatically adds a new column once the width is twice that of a standard column
add a new column of data, and Excel will make that a part of the table
